name: Malmö stad/City of Malmö
memberOrga: (all employees of the city are Fysiska personers and all have access if they wish, to the networks, see below that the city is a member of.)
goal:
Local authority, City of Malmö is Swedens 3rd largest city with more than 345 000 inhabitants

The city is heavily involved in European affairs.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Taxation, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth

Luft
